email_chain.subject: Inquiry: Timber Shipment from Vancouver to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Good morning Alex,

Hope this message finds you well. We are looking to ship approximately 5,000 cubic meters of timber from Vancouver to Shanghai in December. Could you provide us with a starting freight quote? Also, we are interested in knowing the availability of vessels during that period.

Best regards,
Juliet

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: Timber Shipment from Vancouver to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Hi Juliet,

Thank you for reaching out. I can propose an initial freight rate of USD 45 per cubic meter. We have MV TimberCarrier available with a laycan from December 10th to December 15th. Let me know if this suits you, or if we need to discuss this further.

Regards,
Alex

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: Timber Shipment from Vancouver to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Hi Alex,

The rate seems a bit high given the current market conditions. We've seen rates around USD 40 per cubic meter. Could you possibly match that?

Thanks,
Juliet

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: Timber Shipment from Vancouver to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Juliet,

We appreciate your feedback. Given our long-standing relationship, I can adjust the rate to USD 42 per cubic meter. Hoping this meets your expectations and we can finalize the terms soon.

Best regards,
Alex

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: Timber Shipment from Vancouver to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Alex,

Thanks for the adjustment. We can work with USD 42 per cubic meter. Please send over the contract and let’s proceed with finalizing the details.

Best,
Juliet

email_chain.subject: Initial Offer for Wheat Shipment - Vasco to Richards Bay
email_chain.body:
Dear Peter,

I hope this email finds you well. We have the MIGHTY WAVE available for your Wheat shipment from Vasco to Richards Bay. The vessel specifics are: DWT 75000, LOA 225m.

Our initial freight rate is 45 USD per metric ton, CIF. The laycan period we can offer is from April 18-23. Would this be acceptable to you? I look forward to your thoughts.

Kind regards,
Emily Thompson
Seaway Logistics

email_chain.subject: Re: Initial Offer for Wheat Shipment - Vasco to Richards Bay
email_chain.body:
Hi Emily,

Thank you for the details. The rate of 45 USD/MT seems a bit above our current budget. Could we discuss a rate closer to 40 USD/MT considering potential future business? Also, could you specify the demurrage rate?

Best,
Peter

email_chain.subject: Re: Initial Offer for Wheat Shipment - Vasco to Richards Bay
email_chain.body:
Dear Peter,

Appreciating your position, we can potentially adjust the rate to 42 USD/MT. The demurrage would be 9,500 USD per day after a laytime of 72 hours.

Please let me know if this meets your needs.

Best regards,
Emily

email_chain.subject: Re: Initial Offer for Wheat Shipment - Vasco to Richards Bay
email_chain.body:
Emily,

Thank you for the adjustment. However, our finance committee has approved a maximum of 41 USD/MT. If you could match this, I believe we could confirm right away and move towards finalizing.

Regards,
Peter

email_chain.subject: Final Offer for Wheat Shipment - Vasco to Richards Bay
email_chain.body:
Peter,

We've reviewed our margins and can meet you at 41 USD/MT. Expecting a positive ongoing relationship, we're happy to proceed on these terms.

Please confirm at your earliest convenience, and we will start the necessary paperwork.

Best,
Emily

email_chain.subject: Confirmation for Wheat Shipment - Vasco to Richards Bay
email_chain.body:
Dear Emily,

We accept your offer of 41 USD/MT and look forward to a fruitful partnership. Please go ahead with the arrangements.

Best wishes,
Peter

email_chain.subject: Offer for Phosphate Shipment - Jakarta to Durban

email_chain.subject: Re: Offer for Phosphate Shipment - Jakarta to Durban

email_chain.subject: Re: Offer for Phosphate Shipment - Jakarta to Durban

You've got a deal at USD 46/MT!

Let's proceed with the paperwork. I'll send over the charter party for your review shortly.

email_chain.subject: Initial Offer for Phosphate Rock Shipment - Neptune

I hope this message finds you well. We have the Neptune available for your upcoming shipment of Phosphate Rock from Jorf Lasfar to Tampa. The Neptune has a DWT of 75000 and an LOA of 225m.

We are pleased to offer a starting freight of USD 25 per metric ton on FOB terms, with laycan proposed from March 5 to March 10.

Looking forward to your response.

Maritime Brokers

Thank you for the details. The rate of USD 25/MT seems a bit high given current market conditions. Would you be able to go down to USD 23/MT? Additionally, can you confirm demurrage terms?

Thanks,
Henry

email_chain.subject: Re: Revised Offer for Phosphate Rock Shipment - Neptune
email_chain.body:
Dear Henry,

Thank you for your prompt response. We can meet you halfway and offer USD 24/MT. Regarding demurrage, it is fixed at USD 16,000 per day.

Please let me know if this works for you so we can wrap up the details.

Best regards,
Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Final Agreement on Phosphate Rock Shipment - Neptune
email_chain.body:
Hello Sarah,

Best,
Henry

email_chain.subject: Contract Details - Phosphate Rock Shipment - Neptune
email_chain.body:
Hello Henry,

Attached is the final contract outlining the terms we've discussed for the shipment of Phosphate Rock from Jorf Lasfar to Tampa onboard Neptune. Please review and confirm at your earliest convenience.

Thank you,
Sarah

email_chain.subject: Inquiry: FOB Houston to Rotterdam, Steel Coils 7850MT - MV ATLANTIC WAVE
email_chain.body:
Dear Liam,

I'm reaching out to inquire about the possibility of chartering the MV ATLANTIC WAVE for an FOB shipment of approximately 7850MT of steel coils from Houston to Rotterdam. We are aiming for a laycan between June 10-15. Could you please provide the vessel's position, availability, and an initial freight quote?

Best regards,
Julia Morales
Maritime Solutions Inc.

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: FOB Houston to Rotterdam, Steel Coils 7850MT - MV ATLANTIC WAVE
email_chain.body:
Hello Julia,

Thank you for your inquiry. The MV ATLANTIC WAVE is currently in the Caribbean, expected to be open in Houston by June 8. We can meet the specified laycan. The initial freight rate for this route is set at USD 68 per metric ton. Please confirm if this aligns with your budget, or if we need to discuss further.

Best regards,
Liam Thompson
Bulk Ship Brokers Ltd.

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: FOB Houston to Rotterdam, Steel Coils 7850MT - MV ATLANTIC WAVE
email_chain.body:
Hi Liam,

Thanks for the quick response. The rate of USD 68 per MT is a bit above our current budget. Given the steady market conditions, would it be possible to discuss a reduced rate? Additionally, could you specify the demurrage terms?

Looking forward to your reply.
Best, Julia

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: FOB Houston to Rotterdam, Steel Coils 7850MT - MV ATLANTIC WAVE
email_chain.body:
Hello Julia,

Appreciate your feedback. Considering the current market and our keen interest in fulfilling your transportation needs, we can adjust the rate to USD 62 per MT. Demurrage terms are set at USD 25,000 per day. Please let me know if this is acceptable so we can finalize the arrangements.

Regards,
Liam

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: FOB Houston to Rotterdam, Steel Coils 7850MT - MV ATLANTIC WAVE
email_chain.body:
Liam,

Thanks for reconsidering the rate. The offer of USD 62 per MT and the demurrage terms are acceptable. Please proceed with drawing up the necessary contracts, and let's aim to finalize this promptly.

Best regards,
Julia

email_chain.subject: Initial Freight Quote: Wheat Shipment from Odessa to Houston
email_chain.body:
Dear Brian,

I hope this email finds you well. Following our recent discussions, I'm pleased to provide an initial freight quote for the shipment of 5000MT of Wheat from Odessa to Houston.

We are offering this shipment at a rate of USD 46 per metric ton under FOB terms. The vessel proposed for this task is the SEA EMPRESS, with a DWT of 75000 and an LOA of 225m.

Please review our proposal and let us know if there are any additional requirements or adjustments needed.

Best Regards,
Laura Smith
Freight Connections

email_chain.subject: Re: Initial Freight Quote: Wheat Shipment from Odessa to Houston
email_chain.body:
Hi Laura,

Thank you for the prompt quote. However, we are exploring slightly lower rates given the large volume we are transporting. Can you work on adjusting the rate to around USD 43 per metric ton? Additionally, please confirm the available dates for loading.

Regards,
Brian Jones

email_chain.subject: Revised Freight Quote: Wheat Shipment from Odessa to Houston
email_chain.body:
Dear Brian,

Thank you for your feedback. Considering the volume and to foster our business relationship, I can offer a revised rate of USD 44 per metric ton. The laycan period is scheduled from August 10 to August 15.

Please let me know if this meets your expectations so we can proceed with the formalities.

Best Regards,
Laura

email_chain.subject: Finalizing Wheat Shipment from Odessa to Houston
email_chain.body:
Hi Laura,

Thanks for the revised offer. Could you confirm what the demurrage rates would be? Also, is there potential for quicker unloading than the usual process, which could justify the increased rate for us?

Best,
Brian

email_chain.subject: Confirmation: Wheat Shipment from Odessa to Houston
email_chain.body:
Dear Brian,

Appreciate your considerations. The demurrage rate stands at USD 15,000 per day beyond the laydays. However, our operational team has guaranteed an expedited unloading process at Houston, minimizing potential delays.

Please confirm this arrangement so we can start with the paperwork.

Best Regards,
Laura

email_chain.subject: Approval: Wheat Shipment from Odessa to Houston
email_chain.body:
Hello Laura,

Excellent, we appreciate the efforts to expedite the unloading process. We approve the terms provided and look forward to handling this shipment together.

Regards,
Brian Jones

email_chain.subject: Freight Quote for Iron Ore Transport - MV OCEAN GLIDER
email_chain.body:

I hope this message finds you well. We have the MV OCEAN GLIDER available for your iron ore shipment from Durban to Shanghai. The cargo size is approximately 7500MT, offered on CIF terms. Our starting freight quote is USD 55 per MT.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote for Iron Ore Transport - MV OCEAN GLIDER
email_chain.body:
Hi Emma,

Appreciate your feedback. I can offer USD 53 per MT, and I hope this meets your budget. The MV OCEAN GLIDER’s DWT is 89000, and LOA is 290m. Would this be acceptable, including the demurrage rate at USD 15,000 per day?

Warm regards,
Michael

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote for Iron Ore Transport - MV OCEAN GLIDER
email_chain.body:

Emma

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote for Iron Ore Transport - MV OCEAN GLIDER - Laycan Confirmation
email_chain.body:

Best,
Michael

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote for Iron Ore Transport - MV OCEAN GLIDER - Laycan Confirmation
email_chain.body:
Michael,

Best regards,
Emma

Bob Marsh

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Iron Ore Shipment from Port Hedland to Shanghai

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Iron Ore Shipment from Port Hedland to Shanghai - Rate Revision

Ocean Logistics

email_chain.subject: Re: Shipping Inquiry: Steel Coils from Rotterdam to Baltimore - Confirmation

Linda Gomez

email_chain.body: Good morning Linda, Can we discuss the possibility of shipping 5000MT of wheat from Odessa to Alexandria next month? Need your best lumpsum offer. Cheers, Alex

email_chain.body: Hello Alex, Great to hear from you. For 5000MT, we can offer a rate of USD 20,000 lumpsum with our vessel Blue Odyssey. Let me know what you think. Best, Linda

email_chain.subject: Rate Negotiation: Wheat Shipment from Odessa to Alexandria
email_chain.body: Hi Linda, Thanks for the quick reply. The rate is a bit higher than expected. Can we work something out closer to USD 18,000? Best, Alex

email_chain.subject: Re: Rate Negotiation: Wheat Shipment from Odessa to Alexandria
email_chain.body: Alex, Thanks for your counteroffer. Meet me halfway? How does USD 19,000 sound? Cheers, Linda

email_chain.subject: Confirmation: Wheat Shipment from Odessa to Alexandria
email_chain.body: Linda, USD 19,000 works for us. Please send the contract for us to review and confirm. Thanks, Alex

email_chain.subject: Soybean Transport Inquiry - MV OCEAN BREEZE
email_chain.body:
Hello Brenda,

I understand you're looking for a vessel to ship 8000MT of soybeans from Santos to Qingdao. The MV OCEAN BREEZE (DWT: 80000, LOA: 220m) will be available. Our initial freight rate is USD35 per MT on CIF terms, with a laycan from April 5-10. Let me know if this fits your schedule and budget.

Best, Henry

email_chain.subject: Re: Soybean Transport Inquiry - MV OCEAN BREEZE
email_chain.body:
Henry,

Thanks for the quick reply. The rate is a bit high given the current market conditions. Could you consider USD32 per MT? Also, can we push the laycan to April 8-13?

Regards, Brenda

email_chain.subject: Re: Soybean Transport Inquiry - MV OCEAN BREEZE
email_chain.body:
Hi Brenda,

We can meet halfway at USD33.50 per MT. Adjusting the laycan to April 8-13 is possible. I will confirm the demurrage rate and get back to you shortly.

Best regards, Henry

email_chain.subject: Re: Soybean Transport Inquiry - MV OCEAN BREEZE
email_chain.body:
Henry,

USD33.50 per MT is acceptable. Please proceed with the adjusted laycan and confirm the demurrage rate and final terms.

Thanks, Brenda

email_chain.subject: Final Shipping Agreement - MV OCEAN BREEZE
email_chain.body:
Hello Brenda,

Here are the final terms:
- Vessel: MV OCEAN BREEZE
- Cargo: 8000MT Soybeans
- Loading Port: Santos
- Discharge Port: Qingdao
- Laycan: April 8-13
- Freight: USD33.50
- Demurrage: USD 16,000 per day
- Incoterm: CIF
Please confirm at your earliest convenience.

Best, Henry

email_chain.subject: Re: Final Shipping Agreement - MV OCEAN BREEZE
email_chain.body:
Hi Henry,

All terms look good. Consider it confirmed, and please send over the contract.

Best, Brenda

email_chain.subject: Soybean Meal Shipment from Santos to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Dear Sophia,

I hope this message finds you well. We are looking to ship approximately 5000MT of soybean meal from Santos to Rotterdam, targeting an early April laycan. Could you please advise on vessel availability and provide us with an initial lumpsum offer?

Best regards,
Lucas Gray

email_chain.subject: Re: Soybean Meal Shipment from Santos to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Hi Lucas,

Thank you for your inquiry. We can offer the MV OCEAN TRAVELLER for your specified laycan of April 1-5. The initial lumpsum freight quote is EUR 185,000, CFR terms. Please let me know if this works for you or if there are any aspects you'd like to discuss further.

Best,
Sophia

email_chain.subject: Re: Soybean Meal Shipment from Santos to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Dear Sophia,

Thanks for the prompt reply and the details. The quote of EUR 185,000 seems a bit on the higher side given the current market conditions. Could we potentially look at EUR 175,000? Additionally, could you confirm the demurrage terms?

Thanks,
Lucas

email_chain.subject: Re: Soybean Meal Shipment from Santos to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Hi Lucas,

I appreciate your feedback. We can meet halfway and adjust the lumpsum to EUR 180,000. Regarding demurrage, we're looking at EUR 12,000 per day. We hope this revised offer fits your budget more comfortably.

Regards,
Sophia

email_chain.subject: Re: Soybean Meal Shipment from Santos to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Dear Sophia,

Thank you for the revised offer. EUR 180,000 works for us. Please send over the charter party for us to review and finalize. Looking forward to closing this efficiently.

Best,
Lucas

email_chain.subject: LNG Cargo Prospect - MV Arctic Discoverer
email_chain.body:
Hi Tom,

We are looking to move a 2500 MT LNG cargo from Rotterdam to Boston. We are considering your vessel, the MV Arctic Discoverer, for this task. Could you provide the current position of the vessel and your best lumpsum offer for this shipment?

Best regards,
Sara Black

email_chain.subject: Re: LNG Cargo Prospect - MV Arctic Discoverer
email_chain.body:
Hello Sara,

Thank you for considering the MV Arctic Discoverer. She is currently near Gibraltar and can be rerouted to Rotterdam. Our starting lumpsum offer is USD 1.2 million for the shipment. Please let me know your thoughts.

Best, Tom

email_chain.subject: Re: LNG Cargo Prospect - MV Arctic Discoverer - Rate Discussion
email_chain.body:
Hi Tom,

Thanks for the prompt response. The rate seems a bit high given the current market conditions. Can we discuss a possible adjustment to the rate?

Regards,
Sara

email_chain.subject: Re: LNG Cargo Prospect - MV Arctic Discoverer - Revised Offer
email_chain.body:
Hi Sara,

Understanding the market dynamics, we can reduce the lumpsum to USD 1.1 million. We hope this is in line with your expectations. Looking forward to moving forward.

Best, Tom

email_chain.subject: Re: LNG Cargo Prospect - MV Arctic Discoverer - Acceptance of Terms
email_chain.body:
Hello Tom,

Thank you for the adjustment. We accept the revised offer of USD 1.1 million. Please send over the charter party for us to review and finalize.

Best regards,
Sara

email_chain.subject: Steel Coil Transport - Durban to Charleston
email_chain.body:
Dear Sandra,

I trust this message finds you well. We have an upcoming shipment of steel coils from Durban to Charleston and would like to propose the vessel ATLANTIC RAIDER for this task. The cargo size is 5500MT under FOB terms. We are starting with a freight quote of USD 75/MT.

Looking forward to hearing your thoughts on this.

Warm regards,
Lucas Jennings
Maritime Solutions

email_chain.subject: Re: Steel Coil Transport - Durban to Charleston
email_chain.body:
Hi Lucas,

Thanks for the proposal. Could you provide more information regarding the vessel's DWT and length overall? Also, USD 75/MT seems a bit high considering current rates. Could you come down to USD 70/MT?

Best wishes,
Sandra

email_chain.subject: Re: Steel Coil Transport - Durban to Charleston
email_chain.body:
Dear Sandra,

Thanks for your quick response! The ATLANTIC RAIDER has a DWT of 65000 and LOA of 245m. While we understand your concerns about the rate, USD 73/MT is the best we can offer, considering the operational costs involved.

Please let us know if this is workable for you.

Regards,
Lucas

email_chain.subject: Re: Steel Coil Transport - Durban to Charleston
email_chain.body:
Lucas,

Thank you for the update. USD 73/MT is still on the higher end. However, considering the vessel's specs, we might go ahead at USD 72/MT. Can we finalize at this rate?

Cheers,
Sandra

email_chain.subject: Re: Steel Coil Transport - Durban to Charleston
email_chain.body:
Hi Sandra,

We appreciate your consideration and can agree to USD 72/MT to move forward with this deal. We will prepare the necessary contracts and send them over shortly. Please confirm the laycan for our planning.

Best regards,
Lucas

email_chain.subject: Re: Steel Coil Transport - Durban to Charleston
email_chain.body:
Lucas,

That's great, thank you. Let's set the laycan for April 5th to April 10th.

Looking forward to successful cooperation.

Regards,
Sandra

email_chain.subject: Phosphate Shipment Offer: Nouadhibou to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Dear Julian,

Good morning. I hope this email finds you well. As per our recent conversations regarding your phosphate shipping needs, I'm pleased to propose the following for your consideration:

Commodity: Phosphate
Quantity: 10500 MT
Load Port: Nouadhibou
Discharge Port: Rotterdam
Incoterms: CIF
Vessel: MV FREEDOM STAR
Freight: USD 55/MT
Laycan: 05-09 April 2022

We believe this offer to be competitive and look forward to your feedback.

Best regards,
Hannah Mercer
Oceans Freight Solutions

email_chain.subject: Re: Phosphate Shipment Offer: Nouadhibou to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Hello Hannah,

Thank you for the prompt response and the details provided. The rate of USD 55/MT is a bit higher than we anticipated. Could we discuss a possible reduction to USD 50/MT? Additionally, can you provide the vessel's DWT and LOA, as well as the demurrage rate?

Best,
Julian Castillo
Heavy Industries Ltd.

email_chain.subject: Re: Phosphate Shipment Offer: Nouadhibou to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Julian,

Thank you for your reply. In light of our long-standing relationship, I can adjust the freight to USD 53/MT. The MV FREEDOM STAR has a DWT of 48000 and an LOA of 190m. Our demurrage rate stands at USD 12,000 per day.

Please let me know if this is more acceptable.

Regards,
Hannah

email_chain.subject: Re: Phosphate Shipment Offer: Nouadhibou to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Hannah,

Appreciate the revision to USD 53/MT and the additional vessel details. Let's meet halfway at USD 52/MT. If this works, we can proceed immediately with the paperwork.

Thanks,
Julian

email_chain.subject: Re: Phosphate Shipment Offer: Nouadhibou to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Julian,

Thank you for your understanding and flexibility. We agree to USD 52/MT. I'll prepare the necessary documentation and send it over for your signature shortly.

Best regards,
Hannah

email_chain.subject: Initial Iron Ore Shipment Proposal - MV GRAND SEA
email_chain.body:
Dear Peter,

I hope this email finds you well. We are looking to secure a vessel for the shipment of 50,000 MT of iron ore from Port Hedland to Rotterdam. We propose using the MV GRAND SEA, with a deadweight of 180,000 MT and length overall of 295m.

Our starting freight quote is USD 40/MT on CIF terms. The vessel can be ready for loading from December 5-10. We look forward to discussing this with you and confirming specifics.

Best regards,
Sandy Hawkins

email_chain.subject: Re: Initial Iron Ore Shipment Proposal - MV GRAND SEA
email_chain.body:
Hi Sandy,

Thank you for your proposal. Considering current market rates, could we discuss a possible reduction to USD 35/MT? Also, could you please clarify if the demurrage terms are included in this rate?

Best wishes,
Peter Jensen

email_chain.subject: Re: Possible Rate Adjustment - MV GRAND SEA
email_chain.body:
Dear Peter,

Thank you for your feedback. We can offer a reduced rate of USD 37/MT, and this includes standard demurrage terms of USD 20,000 per day beyond the agreed laycan, effective December 5-10.

Please confirm if this meets your expectations so we can proceed with the necessary paperwork.

Best regards,
Sandy

email_chain.subject: Re: Possible Rate Adjustment - MV GRAND SEA
email_chain.body:
Hello Sandy,

The revised rate of USD 37/MT seems fair. We agree to proceed on these terms. Please send the contract draft and let's finalize the shipment schedule.

Best,
Peter

email_chain.subject: Final Contract and Recap - MV GRAND SEA Iron Ore Shipment
email_chain.body:
Dear Peter,

Attached please find the final contract along with the shipment recap for your review:
- Commodity: Iron Ore
- Cargo Size: 50,000MT
- Load Port: Port Hedland
- Disch Port: Rotterdam
- Freight Rate: USD 37/MT CIF
- Laycan: December 5-10
- Demurrage: USD 20,000/day

Looking forward to your confirmation.

Best regards,
Sandy

email_chain.subject: Re: Final Contract and Recap - MV GRAND SEA Iron Ore Shipment
email_chain.body:
Hi Sandy,

I've reviewed the recap and contract, and everything looks in order. I am sending the signed contract back to you. Thank you for your assistance and looking forward to a smooth shipment.

Best regards,
Peter

email_chain.subject: Request for Quotation: Wheat Shipment from Odessa to Alexandria
email_chain.body:
Hi Tom,

We're planning a shipment of 14500MT of wheat from Odessa to Alexandria. Could you please provide your best freight rate for a suitable vessel under FOB terms?

Regards,
Alice

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Quotation: Wheat Shipment from Odessa to Alexandria
email_chain.body:
Hello Alice,

Thank you for your request. We can offer the vessel SEA GIANT with a freight rate of USD 47 per MT. The SEA GIANT has a DWT of 77000 and an LOA of 225 meters. Please let me know if you require further details.

Best regards,
Tom

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Quotation: Wheat Shipment from Odessa to Alexandria
email_chain.body:
Hi Tom,

USD 47 per MT seems high given current market conditions. Can we negotiate a better rate? Also, can you provide the available laycan dates and the demurrage rate?

Thanks,
Alice

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Quotation: Wheat Shipment from Odessa to Alexandria - Revised Offer
email_chain.body:
Alice,

Understood. I can bring down the rate to USD 42 per MT. Laycan dates are from March 1st to 5th, and the demurrage rate is USD 12,000 per day. Let me know if this meets your requirements.

Regards,
Tom

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Quotation: Wheat Shipment from Odessa to Alexandria - Revised Offer
email_chain.body:
Tom,

Thanks for your revised offer. We accept the rate of USD 42 per MT and the specified laycan dates. Please send the contract and charter party for us to review.

Best,
Alice

email_chain.subject: Iron Ore Shipment - Quebec to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Hi Tom,

We have been reviewing possibilities for your iron ore shipment from Quebec to Shanghai. Based on current availability and market rates, I can offer a preliminary freight rate of USD 17.50 per ton. Lisa

email_chain.subject: Re: Iron Ore Shipment - Quebec to Shanghai

Thanks,
Tom

email_chain.subject: Re: Iron Ore Shipment - Quebec to Shanghai
email_chain.body:

Best,
Lisa

email_chain.subject: Re: Iron Ore Shipment - Quebec to Shanghai
email_chain.body:

USD 16.75 is much more acceptable. Please proceed with the necessary arrangements and send over the charter party for my review. Also, confirm the laycan for this rate.

email_chain.subject: Charter Party and Laycan Confirmation - Iron Ore Shipment
email_chain.body:

email_chain.subject: Re: Charter Party and Laycan Confirmation - Iron Ore Shipment
email_chain.body:

email_chain.subject: Offer for Steel Billets Transport - Antwerp to Savannah

Hello Mike,

I trust this mail finds you well. We have a suitable vessel, the OCEANIC STAR, ready to transport 15000MT of steel billets from Antwerp to Savannah. The starting freight rate is USD 45 per MT on CIF terms. Could you please let us know your consideration at your earliest convenience?

Maritime Brokers

email_chain.subject: Re: Offer for Steel Billets Transport - Antwerp to Savannah
email_chain.body:

email_chain.subject: Re: Offer for Steel Billets Transport - Antwerp to Savannah
email_chain.body:

email_chain.subject: Final Confirmation - Steel Billets Transport Antwerp to Savannah

email_chain.subject: Re: Final Confirmation - Steel Billets Transport Antwerp to Savannah
email_chain.body:
Lara,

All terms are acceptable. Please proceed with the charter party and send for signature.

email_chain.subject: LNG Shipment Inquiry - Houston to Rotterdam
email_chain.body: Good morning Elena, I hope this message finds you well. We are planning to ship approximately 5000 cubic meters of liquefied natural gas from Houston to Rotterdam. We're targeting early October for loading. Could you please provide me with your best offer and vessel availability? Please include necessary details such as freight rate, vessel specifications, and laycan. Best regards, Michael Jensen

email_chain.subject: Re: LNG Shipment Inquiry - Houston to Rotterdam
email_chain.body: Hello Michael, Thank you for reaching out with your request. We can offer the vessel 'Neptune Star' with a DWT of 75000 and LOA of 274m. Our initial freight rate for this shipment would be USD 100 per cubic meter based on CIF terms. The available laycan is from 2023-10-03 to 2023-10-07. Please let me know if this meets your requirements or if there are any other details you'd like to discuss. Warm regards, Elena Cruz

email_chain.subject: Negotiation on Freight Rate - LNG Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Elena, Thanks for the prompt reply and the details. The rate of USD 100 per cubic meter is slightly above our budget. Given the size of the shipment, could you consider a rate of USD 95 per cubic meter? Also, could you confirm if the 'Neptune Star' is ice-class compliant, as this is crucial for our operations in the winter season? Best, Michael

email_chain.subject: Re: Negotiation on Freight Rate - LNG Shipment
email_chain.body: Dear Michael, I appreciate your feedback and understand your budget constraints. We can agree to a revised rate of USD 97 per cubic meter. I confirm that 'Neptune Star' is indeed ice-class compliant, ensuring smooth operation during the winter season as per your requirements. If this new rate works for you, please let us know so we can finalize the charter party agreement. Regards, Elena

email_chain.subject: Confirmation and Proceed with Booking
email_chain.body: Hello Elena, Thank you for the revised offer and confirming the vessel's compliance. We are happy to proceed with the rate of USD 97 per cubic meter. Please go ahead and secure the 'Neptune Star' for us and send over the necessary paperwork for the charter. Looking forward to a successful operation. Best, Michael

email_chain.subject: Charter Party Agreement and Next Steps
email_chain.body: Hi Michael, Excellent! I will initiate the paperwork for the charter party agreement and send it over to you for signatures by tomorrow. The 'Neptune Star' will be reserved for your shipment. We look forward to working with you on this project and many more in the future. Warm regards, Elena

email_chain.subject: Proposal for Wheat Transport - Santos to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Dear Lisa,

I hope this message finds you in good spirits. I am reaching out from Global Shipping Corporation with an offer to transport 25000MT of wheat from Santos to Rotterdam. We propose using our vessel, the Ocean Navigator, under FOB terms. Our preliminary freight quote is USD 32 per metric ton. Please let us know your thoughts on this initial offer.

Best regards,
Michael Clark

email_chain.subject: Re: Proposal for Wheat Transport - Santos to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Hi Michael,

Thank you for the offer. The rate of USD 32 per MT is slightly above our current budget. Given the market conditions, could you reconsider the rate? Also, could you please provide details on the vessel's DWT and LOA?

Regards,
Lisa Rhodes

email_chain.subject: Re: Proposal for Wheat Transport - Santos to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Hello Lisa,

Thank you for your response. Considering your budget concerns, we can revise the freight quote to USD 29.50 per MT. The Ocean Navigator has a DWT of 80000 and an LOA of 229 meters. I hope this revised offer is more aligned with your expectations. Please advise.

Best,
Michael

email_chain.subject: Re: Proposal for Wheat Transport - Santos to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Michael,

The revised rate of USD 29.50 per MT is more favorable. Please confirm the laycan and whether demurrage terms can be negotiated further.

Thanks,
Lisa

email_chain.subject: Re: Proposal for Wheat Transport - Santos to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Dear Lisa,

We appreciate your swift response. We can set the laycan for October 5-10. As for demurrage, our standard rate is USD 20,000 per day. We can discuss further if this is a critical point for you.

Looking forward to your confirmation.
Best regards,
Michael

email_chain.subject: Re: Proposal for Wheat Transport - Santos to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Michael,

Thank you for the details. We agree to the laycan of October 5-10 and accept the demurrage rate as is. Please proceed with finalizing the charter party.

Best,
Lisa

Hope you're doing well. I am reaching out to provide the initial quote for your upcoming shipment of wheat from Rotterdam to Singapore. We propose to use the vessel OCEAN VENTURE, with a DWT of 85000 and LOA of 225m.

Nautical Logistics

Lisa Jones

email_chain.subject: Re: New Wheat Shipment Quote - Rotterdam to Singapore
email_chain.body:

Please let me know so we can move forward.

Kind regards,
Peter

email_chain.subject: Re: New Wheat Shipment Quote - Rotterdam to Singapore
email_chain.body:

email_chain.subject: Final Confirmation - Wheat Shipment Rotterdam to Singapore
email_chain.body:

email_chain.subject: Re: Wheat Shipment Proposal - MV GLORY

email_chain.subject: Re: Wheat Shipment Proposal - MV GLORY

email_chain.subject: Rate Inquiry: Timber Shipping from Vancouver to Shanghai

email_chain.subject: Re: Rate Inquiry: Timber Shipping from Vancouver to Shanghai

email_chain.subject: Re: Initial Wheat Shipment Query - Tacoma to Yokohama

email_chain.subject: Freight Request: Steel Pipes from Bilbao to Halifax
email_chain.body:
Dear Paul,

I hope this message finds you well. We are looking to transport approximately 5000MT of steel pipes from Bilbao to Halifax. We are considering your vessel, the ORION VOYAGER, for this shipment under DAP terms. Could you please provide us with a freight quote and the availability of the vessel? Additionally, please include any pertinent details regarding demurrage terms.

Best regards,
Helen Cho

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Request: Steel Pipes from Bilbao to Halifax
email_chain.body:
Hello Helen,

Thank you for your inquiry. The ORION VOYAGER can be available for your specified cargo with a laycan window from August 5th to August 10th. Our initial freight quote is USD 95 per metric ton. This rate includes standard loading procedures but excludes demurrage, which is quoted separately at USD 8,000 per day beyond the laydays.

Please let me know if this initial quote works for you or if there are any other specifics you would like to discuss.

Best regards,
Paul Morris

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Request: Rate Review and Additional Terms
email_chain.body:
Dear Paul,

Thank you for the prompt response. Given the current market trends, the starting rate seems slightly above the average. Could we consider a rate closer to USD 90 per MT? Additionally, can we cap the demurrage exposure to 5 days maximum?

Looking forward to your thoughts.
Best, Helen

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Request: Proposed Adjustments
email_chain.body:
Hi Helen,

Appreciating your concerns about the rates, we can adjust the freight quote to USD 92 per MT and agree to a demurrage cap of 5 days. I hope this meets your budget and mitigates risk effectively. Please confirm at your earliest convenience so we can finalize the booking and initiate the contractual process.

Regards,
Paul

email_chain.subject: Re: Final Confirmation: Steel Pipes Shipment
email_chain.body:
Hello Paul,

Thank you for your flexibility. We agree to the revised rate of USD 92 per MT and the demurrage terms. Please proceed with the necessary paperwork. We look forward to a successful shipment.

Best regards,
Helen Cho

email_chain.subject: Initial Freight Quote for Steel Billets: MV Ocean Carrier
email_chain.body:
Dear Derek,

I hope this message finds you well. We are excited to present our initial freight quote for the transportation of 15,000 metric tons of steel billets from Yokohama to Seattle under FOB terms. The vessel proposed for this shipment is MV Ocean Carrier, with a DWT of 80000.

Our starting quote stands at USD 40 per metric ton. MV Ocean Carrier will be available for loading from April 20 to April 24, ensuring smooth operations at the port.

We look forward to your feedback and are ready to finalize the arrangements at your earliest convenience.

Best Regards,
Sandra Burrows
Maritime Brokings

email_chain.body:

Looking forward to your response.

Regards,
Derek

email_chain.subject: Re: Rate Negotiation for Steel Billets Shipment on MV Ocean Carrier
email_chain.body:
Dear Derek,

Thank you for your response. Considering the competitive market, I have discussed with our planning team and can offer a revised rate of USD 37 per metric ton. The LOA for MV Ocean Carrier is 225 meters, which should comfortably fit within your docking facilities.

Please let me know if this meets your requirements so we can proceed with the booking.

Warm Regards,
Sandra

email_chain.subject: Re: Revised Quote for Steel Billets: MV Ocean Carrier
email_chain.body:

Appreciate the revised rate and the LOA confirmation. We accept the new rate of USD 37 per MT. Could you please send the draft contract for review? Also, could you confirm the demurrage terms in case of any unforeseen delays?

Best,
Derek

email_chain.subject: Contract and Demurrage Details for Steel Billets Shipment: MV Ocean Carrier
email_chain.body:
Dear Derek,

Great to hear that! I am attaching the draft contract for your review. As per our standard terms, the demurrage rate is set at USD 15,000 per day, applicable only after the first 48 hours of delay beyond the agreed laycan, which remains April 20-24.

Please review the contract and let us know if there are any amendments needed.

Best Regards,
Sandra

email_chain.subject: Approval of Contract: MV Ocean Carrier Steel Billets Shipment
email_chain.body:
Hi Sandra,

Everything looks good in the contract, and the demurrage terms are clear. We are ready to move forward. Please proceed with finalizing the arrangements.

Thank you for all your assistance.

Regards,
Derek

Henry Clark

Laura Jennings

Seaway Brokers

Peter Grimm
Seaway Brokers

Laura Bennet
Atlantic Horizon

email_chain.subject: Re: Steel Shipment: Terms Agreement

Peter Grimm
Seaway Brokers

Laura Bennet
Atlantic Horizon

Natalie Cole

email_chain.subject: Re: Coal Shipment Negotiation: Newcastle to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Dear Natalie,

Thank you for your response. Considering your volume request and the current market conditions, I can adjust our rate to USD 16.50 per MT. The LOA of MV COLOSSUS is 230 meters, suitable for Rotterdam's port facilities.

Our suggested laycan is from January 20 to January 25. Please confirm if these new conditions work for you so we can finalize the booking.

Warm regards,
Ethan

Ethan

email_chain.subject: Re: Final Agreement: Coal Shipment from Newcastle to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:

Best,
Natalie

email_chain.subject: Offer for Coal Transport from Newcastle to Rotterdam

Dear Tom Reid,

I hope this email finds you well. I'm reaching out to propose the use of our vessel 'Ocean Deliverer' for your next shipment of coal from Newcastle to Rotterdam. We can handle up to 75,000 MT. Our initial rate is EUR 45 per MT under FIO terms for August laycan.

Looking forward to your thoughts or any specific requirements you might have.

Best regards,
Emily Hudson
Sea Gateway Brokers

email_chain.subject: Re: Offer for Coal Transport from Newcastle to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Hello Emily,

Thanks for the quick offer. We are indeed looking to book a shipment in that window. Could you provide more details about the vessel's size and demurrage terms? Also, are you able to adjust the initial freight rate slightly lower?

Best,
Tom Reid

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight & Vessel Details
email_chain.body:
Hi Tom,

Thank you for your response. The 'Ocean Deliverer' has a DWT of 80000 and LOA of 295m. In terms of demurrage, we typically offer EUR 22,500 per day. However, given your interest in a more competitive rate, how does EUR 42.50 per MT sound?

Please let me know if this meets your requirements or if there's anything else we can adjust.

Best regards,
Emily

email_chain.subject: Re: Revised Offer
email_chain.body:
Emily,

The revised rate of EUR 42.50 per MT is attractive. Please confirm laycan dates remain unchanged, and let's finalize the agreement.

Regards,
Tom

email_chain.subject: Re: Confirmation & Finalization
email_chain.body:
Dear Tom,

Perfect! We confirm the laycan dates for August 10-15. I will prepare and send the contract for your review and signature today.

Thank you for choosing to work with us, and looking forward to a successful shipment.

Best regards,
Emily

email_chain.subject: Re: Finalization of Coal Shipment
email_chain.body:
Emily,

Received the contract and everything is in order. We'll sign and return it by end of today. Thanks for all your help!

Kind regards,
Tom

Coastal Cargo Ltd.

Regards,
Laura

email_chain.subject: Re: Soybean Shipment from Santos to Rotterdam

Jake

email_chain.subject: Re: Soybean Shipment from Santos to Rotterdam

Laura
[ATTACHMENTS: revised_quote.pdf, charter_party_draft.pdf]

email_chain.subject: Re: Soybean Shipment from Santos to Rotterdam

All looks good. I'll have the contracts team review the documents and we'll get back to you with a signed copy by tomorrow. Thanks for accommodating the changes.

email_chain.subject: Wheat Shipment Enquiry - Vancouver to Karachi

email_chain.body:

Michael

email_chain.subject: Re: Wheat Shipment Enquiry - Vancouver to Karachi
email_chain.body:

Michael

email_chain.subject: Re: Finalization of Wheat Shipment Agreement - SS Zephyr

Trade Winds Importers

Michael

email_chain.body:

The GLORIOUS VENTURE is available for the dates you mentioned. Please confirm if this meets your needs, so we can proceed with the formalities. 

Warm regards, 
Alice

email_chain.subject: Confirmation of Revised Quote and Shipping Arrangements

Michael

email_chain.subject: Initial Freight Offer for Wheat Shipment - MV Bluewave

Sandra Carter
Blue Marine Solutions

Warm regards,
Sandra Carter

Best,
Peter Brady

email_chain.body:

Thank you for your confirmation. We will finalize the agreement with the rate of USD 66 per metric ton and schedule loading from November 5 to November 10. The necessary documentation is being prepared and will be sent to you shortly.

Looking forward to a successful shipment.

Best regards,
Sandra Carter

Michael

email_chain.body:

I hope this email finds you well. We are looking to ship 5000 MT of grain from Vancouver to Manila. MS ATLANTIS is available for this route, and we are initially quoting a freight rate of USD 42/MT. The vessel can be available for laycan between October 10-15. Please let me know your thoughts.

Best regards,
Sandra Johnson
Oceanic Brokers

email_chain.subject: Re: Grain Shipment Inquiry: MS ATLANTIS
email_chain.body:
Hi Sandra,

Thanks for the quick proposal. Given the market dynamics, could we consider adjusting the freight rate? Competitors are offering closer to USD 38/MT. Also, can we push the laycan to October 20-25?

Regards,
Liam

email_chain.subject: Re: Grain Shipment Inquiry: MS ATLANTIS
email_chain.body:
Hello Liam,

Thank you for your feedback. We can meet halfway at USD 40/MT and adjust the laycan to October 18-23. Does this work for your schedule?

Best,
Sandra

email_chain.subject: Re: Grain Shipment Inquiry: MS ATLANTIS
email_chain.body:
Sandra,

USD 40/MT sounds fair. Please confirm the revised terms so we can proceed with the necessary documentation.

Best,
Liam

email_chain.subject: Finalization of Grain Shipment: MS ATLANTIS
email_chain.body:
Dear Liam,

Great! I'm glad we could agree on the terms. Attaching the contract with the revised rate of USD 40/MT and laycan dates October 18-23. Please review and sign at your earliest convenience.

Thank you,
Sandra

email_chain.subject: FMCG Goods Shipment from Hamburg to Tampa

We are looking to move 5200MT of FMCG goods from Hamburg to Tampa under FOB terms. Can you provide a vessel option and initial freight rate for early April?

Alice Murray

email_chain.subject: Re: FMCG Goods Shipment from Hamburg to Tampa
email_chain.body:
Alice,

Greetings! We can offer the vessel OCEANIC STAR for this route. Initial freight rate would be USD 28 per metric ton. Please let me know if this suits you or if further discussions are needed.

Best,
Bob

email_chain.subject: Re: FMCG Goods Shipment from Hamburg to Tampa
email_chain.body:
Bob,

The rate seems a bit high. Can we work something out around USD 25 per MT? Also, could you confirm the vessel's DWT and LOA?

Thanks,
Alice

email_chain.subject: Re: FMCG Goods Shipment from Hamburg to Tampa
email_chain.body:
Alice,

The OCEANIC STAR has a DWT of 50000 and LOA of 200m. As for the rate, the best I can offer is USD 26.50 per MT. Let me know if we can lock this in.

Regards,
Bob

email_chain.subject: Re: FMCG Goods Shipment from Hamburg to Tampa
email_chain.body:
Bob,

We'll take it at USD 26.50 per MT. Please prepare the contract. What are the laycan dates?

Thanks,
Alice

email_chain.subject: Re: FMCG Goods Shipment from Hamburg to Tampa
email_chain.body:
Alice,

Great! Laycan dates are from April 5th to April 8th. Contract coming your way shortly.

Best,
Bob

email_chain.subject: Initial Freight Quote - Bauxite Shipment from Conakry to Amsterdam
email_chain.body:
Dear Clara Jennings,

I hope this message finds you well. Following our recent discussions, I am pleased to offer you a preliminary freight quote for shipping 5000MT of Bauxite from Conakry to Amsterdam. The vessel we propose for this shipment is the HORIZON STAR, which has a DWT of 75600.

Our initial offer is USD 58.00 per metric ton. The laycan period is proposed for October 10-15.

Looking forward to your thoughts and hoping to finalize the arrangements soon.

Best Regards,
Lucas Morgan
Horizon Shipping Services

email_chain.subject: Re: Initial Freight Quote - Bauxite Shipment from Conakry to Amsterdam
email_chain.body:
Hello Lucas,

Thank you for the quick provision of the freight quote. Is there any flexibility on the rate? Considering the volume and our long-term business prospects, a more competitive rate would be highly beneficial.

Could you please review the possibility of lowering the freight to USD 54.00 per MT?

Best regards,
Clara Jennings

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote Adjustment - Bauxite Shipment from Conakry to Amsterdam
email_chain.body:
Dear Clara,

I appreciate your feedback and understand the need for more competitive pricing. After revisiting our costs and considering our future cooperation, I can offer a revised rate of USD 55.50 per MT.

Please let me know if this meets your expectations, so we can proceed with the booking of HORIZON STAR.

Best Regards,
Lucas Morgan

email_chain.subject: Re: Revised Freight Quote - Bauxite Shipment
email_chain.body:
Hello Lucas,

Thanks for considering our request. The revised quote of USD 55.50 per MT is acceptable. Could you confirm the demurrage terms and the vessel's draft to ensure there won't be any issues during berthing at Amsterdam port?

Thank you,
Clara

email_chain.subject: Final Details - Bauxite Shipment from Conakry to Amsterdam
email_chain.body:
Dear Clara,

Thank you for your acceptance. I can confirm that the draft of HORIZON STAR is 13m, compatible with Amsterdam's port facilities. Regarding demurrage, we propose a rate of USD 15,000 per day, effective only if a delay occurs beyond the contracted laydays, which are from October 10-15.

If these terms are agreeable, I will finalize our agreement. Please confirm at your earliest convenience.

Best Regards,
Lucas Morgan

email_chain.subject: Approval of Final Terms - Bauxite Shipment
email_chain.body:
Hi Lucas,

All terms are satisfactory, including the demurrage rate. Please proceed with the necessary documentation and secure the vessel for our shipment.

Thanks for all your assistance.

Best regards,
Clara Jennings

email_chain.subject: Steel Shipment Proposal - Tampico to Rotterdam

Dear Jacob,

Our vessel, the SEA VOYAGER, is ready for this task. The initial freight quote stands at EUR50 per MT. We are eager to discuss this further and adjust as necessary to meet your logistical needs.

Elena Clark
Silver Lining Shipping

Jacob Tyler

Elena

email_chain.subject: Re: Steel Shipment Proposal - Tampico to Rotterdam

email_chain.subject: Re: Steel Shipment Proposal - Tampico to Rotterdam

Warm regards,
Elena

Ocean Freight Brokers

Look forward to your thoughts.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote Adjustment for Phosphate Shipment: SS Navigator
email_chain.body:

Thank you for considering a long-term partnership with us. With the potential for an extended collaboration, we're willing to revise our rate to USD 52 per MT. Regarding demurrage, we typically charge USD 9,000 per day after the laycan period ends.

Please confirm if this revised offer aligns better with your company’s expectations so that we can finalize the arrangements.

If you agree, I'll prepare the necessary documentation to finalize our agreement.

Best regards,

email_chain.subject: Re: Final Confirmation for Phosphate Shipment: SS Navigator
email_chain.body:

Appreciating your concern, we can adjust the rate to $52 per metric ton considering a long-term engagement. The demurrage would be priced at $15,000 per day.

Looking forward to your response.

Best,
Lisa

email_chain.subject: Re: Initial Freight Proposal for Wheat Shipment - Houston to Kobe
email_chain.body:
Lisa,

$52 is more in line with our budget. However, for the demurrage rate, our finance team suggests that we cannot go beyond $12,000 per day. If this is acceptable, please confirm and we can finalize the terms.

Cheers,
Mark

email_chain.subject: Re: Initial Freight Proposal for Wheat Shipment - Houston to Kobe
email_chain.body:
Good morning Mark,

We understand your position and agree to the demurrage rate of $12,000 per day. I'll prepare the contract draft and send it over for your review.

Best regards,
Lisa

email_chain.subject: Freight Quote for Barley Transport - Vancouver to Liverpool
email_chain.body:
Dear Tom,

I hope you're well.

Following our recent discussions, I'm providing an initial freight quote for the transportation of 5000MT of Barley from Vancouver to Liverpool. Our quote is GBP 55 per metric ton. The shipment is proposed aboard the vessel SS MARINER, with a DWT of 75000 and LOA of 225m.

Please review this preliminary offer and let us know your thoughts.

Best regards,
Lisa Hawkins
Seafront Logistics

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote for Barley Transport - Vancouver to Liverpool
email_chain.body:
Hi Lisa,

Thanks for the quick response. The initial rate seems a bit on the higher side given the current market conditions. Given our ongoing need for transport, can we work on a better rate? We're projecting multiple shipments over the next year.

Could you also inform us about the demurrage rates?

Thanks,
Tom Blackwell
Brewery International

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote for Barley Transport - Vancouver to Liverpool
email_chain.body:
Dear Tom,

Appreciating your concerns about the freight rate, and considering our prospective long-term cooperation, I can adjust the rate to GBP 52 per metric ton. The demurrage rate stands at GBP 7,500 per day.

Let me know if this is agreeable, and if there are any other aspects you'd like to discuss.

Best,
Lisa
Seafront Logistics

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote for Barley Transport - Vancouver to Liverpool
email_chain.body:
Hi Lisa,

GBP 52 is much better. Could you provide the laycan dates for this rate?

Best,
Tom

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote for Barley Transport - Vancouver to Liverpool
email_chain.body:
Tom,

Thank you for your swift response. The laycan period is proposed from April 10 to April 15, 2022. Please confirm if this aligns with your schedule, or if there are any adjustments we should consider.

Warm regards,
Lisa
Seafront Logistics

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote for Barley Transport - Vancouver to Liverpool - Confirmation
email_chain.body:
Lisa,

The terms and laycan are acceptable. We agree to proceed with the shipment at the revised quote and terms. Please go ahead with the necessary arrangements.

Thank you,
Tom Blackwell
Brewery International

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote for Barley Transport - Vancouver to Liverpool - Confirmation
email_chain.body:
Dear Tom,

Great! We'll proceed as confirmed and I'll keep you updated on the arrangements. Looking forward to our continued partnership.

Best, 
Lisa
Seafront Logistics

email_chain.subject: Request for Phosphate Shipment – Brisbane to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Dear Diana,

I hope this email finds you in good spirits. We are looking to charter a vessel for a phosphate shipment from Brisbane to Rotterdam totaling around 15000 MT. We've heard great things about the reliability of your vessels and services. Could you suggest a vessel and provide us with an initial lumpsum freight quote?

Kind regards,
Lucas Graham

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Phosphate Shipment – Brisbane to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Hello Lucas,

Thank you for your inquiry. We can offer our vessel, the MV OCEAN TRADER, for your phosphate shipment. The preliminary lumpsum quote is EUR 1.2 million. The ship remains open for loading from April 10-15. 

Please let me know if this aligns with your schedule and if you need more detailed specifications of the vessel or other operational details.

Best regards,
Diana Choi

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Phosphate Shipment – Rate Discussion
email_chain.body:
Hi Diana,

Thank you for the prompt reply. The rate of EUR 1.2 million is slightly above our budget. Given the current market conditions and our potential long-term business, could you consider revising the rate? Additionally, could you provide the demurrage terms?

Best regards,
Lucas

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Phosphate Shipment – Revised Offer
email_chain.body:
Hello Lucas,

We value your business and in light of our future cooperation, I am able to reduce the freight rate to EUR 1.1 million. The demurrage rate would be EUR 20,000 per day after a laytime of 5 days. Let's finalize this if it meets your approval.

Looking forward to your response.
Best regards,
Diana

email_chain.subject: Re: Request for Phosphate Shipment – Confirmation
email_chain.body:
Dear Diana,

We appreciate the revised offer and agree to the rate of EUR 1.1 million with the terms specified. Please proceed with the necessary paperwork and let's aim for a smooth operation.

Thank you once again for accommodating our needs. Looking forward to a successful shipment.

Kind regards,
Lucas
